sections.heading: Contracts; changes authorized.A design-build contract and a construction manager-general contractor contract may be conditioned upon later refinements in scope and price and may permit an authorized agency in agreement with the design-builder or construction manager to make changes in the project wi
sections.text: Contracts; changes authorized.A design-build contract and a construction manager-general contractor contract may be conditioned upon later refinements in scope and price and may permit an authorized agency in agreement with the design-builder or construction manager to make changes in the project without invalidating the contract.SourceLaws 2025, LB660, ยง 17.Operative Date: September 3, 2025
